attributes.additional_details: As this has been on the news about Gary Neville slams 'DISGRACEFUL' referee in England's World Cup defeat to France. And Harry Maguire slams 'really poor' referee in England vs France. A lot more complaints from stars and celebrities of England have not been happy about the referee. A rematch should be decided between both countries and should be decided in parliament.
attributes.background: Consider a rematch between England and France due to Wilton Sampaio being known as a 'French fan'. The referee was unfair and didn't make the match fair enough.
